website_summaries.verdict: Aluminum dovetail marker with four slope proportions marked for hardwood or softwood.
pros: This handy aluminum woodworking tool can easily hand-mark accurate dovetail layout
Offers four kinds of proportions marked for hardwood or softwood.Manufacturer offers 30-day money back guarantee
cons: Does not come with any instructions

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it I thought oh no! There I go again impulse buying. LOL. But actually is very nice. I’ve used it two times for two different dovetail projects. It’s very light. Very easy to use. And very well-made. I recommend it for any woodwork are cutting dovetails.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice little dovetail guide
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little tool. It could be made much better with the simple addition of a QR code linking the packaging to a webpage with detailed instructions, explanations, examples, or even videos. Any set of directions for use would add value that is missing from your packaging entirely.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool and fairly cheap
customer_reviews.text: At first it confused me because when practicing dove tails i would draw up to the cut end and with this you mark the"negative" tails to be cut on one board, and the "postive" tails on the other. It's a pretty simple pretty cool jig for not much money. Feels pretty heavy and the tab that rests on the board is true.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Dovetail Layout Tool
customer_reviews.text: The dovetail guide is well manufactured. It provides additional value by having four dovetail angles; two angles are drawn on the outside of the guide, and two more on the inside -- very clever.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for marking dovetails. Good construction. Instructions for use can be found on YouTube. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, Useful & Well-Built
customer_reviews.text: This handy little tool gives you 4 options so far as angles. It is very easy to use. It seems to be well made. I just got it a couple of days ago and they are already asking for this review. However, I have used a friend's many times and finally decided to get my own. Hand cut dove tails are fun and not as difficult as some people think. Rob Cosman recently made a video with a few new twists that really work. If you are thinking about getting one of these, go ahead and order it. Not expensive, definitely helpful and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Red Stick

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use it often and it works fantastic. Only thing i would change would be to make it out of metal that I can use my magnet strip above my work bench.
customer_reviews.author: patriot

customer_reviews.title: Mark Dovetail Lines, by hand
customer_reviews.text: took a class at the MASW "Marc Adams School of Woodworking" and I built a Moxon Vice and needed this tool. However I needed several others to make hand cut dovetails. Marking Knife, and Calipers. A most interesting class, my picture show the project, dovetails are hard to make out.
customer_reviews.author: Arch Villian

customer_reviews.title: How do I make it go?
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. I'm not familiar with making dovetails and while this may be the best ever, I have no idea. No instructions. Zip! I'll keep looking but one would think if you put something out there you would at least point to the starter button. Geez!
customer_reviews.author: twohorses

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tool
customer_reviews.text: I give this 4.5 stars. Since I can't give 1/2 star, I marked it at 4 stars. The only thing needed to get this from 4.5 to 5 stars would be clear marking which angle is which. Overall, I like it, and will use it whenever I make a dovetail.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Dan

customer_reviews.title: a NO regrets choice, that leaves a smile
customer_reviews.text: nice, quality-seeming contruction, perhaps aluminum, rather than plastic. Light-weight with easily readable markings with four common angle choices. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Discoveror

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Made out of metal and I guarantee I'll lose before it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Triple c

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet but I can tell that I’m probably not going to use it much. It is pretty well made but I find the 90 degree base isn’t in line with the rake of the tail. It’s slightly offset.
customer_reviews.author: The Starving Woodworker

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Works well, accurate and easy to use. Aluminum is somewhat light duty, I prefer the stainless steel versions.
customer_reviews.author: Glen E ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great quality jig.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this dovetail marker is definitely very good. First time jig user for marking this type of joinery. Would have been nice for some sort of explanation of joint ratios included in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Brucedusty

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong piece of aluminum well marked and provides consistent dovetails. I am very pleased with my purchase. I have not had a chance to use this in a project yet. I have tested it on some scrap wood. It is easy to hold and control.
customer_reviews.author: Oregor

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I understand the general idea here but instructions and demonstrations would be nice to include.
customer_reviews.author: CGP

customer_reviews.title: For my money, best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a Bathroom remodel, floor, four walls, all cuts were accurate, easy to see, easy to control. For The money I invested in this tile cutter, Porter cable did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T. McCombs

customer_reviews.title: Not my go to marker
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bite to determine angle a cross from the edge as it covers the line
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used yet but appears to be well constructed. I don’t anticipate any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Murphy

customer_reviews.title: It's tough and quite a beauty
customer_reviews.text: The jig is super easy to use. Professional and layman alike. Feel free to buy one if you are interested in dovetailing. I needed one to help me along the way of understanding how to mark and cut the angles needed. I'm getting better because it did make marking easier.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: ... hobbyist just learning to cut dovetails this is a great gauge to have
customer_reviews.text: As a hobbyist just learning to cut dovetails this is a great gauge to have, multiple angles and easy to read markings.
customer_reviews.author: Oberoni

customer_reviews.title: Quality Tool
customer_reviews.text: Lettering very clear and bright. Quality built. Used to make Dovetails for a small box to keep some Jewelry in. Looking forward to making other things. Highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Makes hand cutting dovetail joints much easier and more accurate
customer_reviews.author: Roy  Moulesong

customer_reviews.title: I’m just learning how to use it it is very durable and very accurate I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I’m just learning how to use it it is very durable and very accurate I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Retired

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this gave. It's my first but it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The product came in great shape, was well packaged. I found it easy to use. For the money, it was a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: rocketman28

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: laying out tails and pins are quick and easy great product
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lamie

customer_reviews.title: Good little jig
customer_reviews.text: Good dovetail jig for the money. There are better ones out there but not at this price point. Having said that, i would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Great, handy tool for any wood worker!
customer_reviews.text: So far I really enjoy this product. It seems to be well made and makes the perfect marks for the dove tails. If there are any cons to it I have not found them yet. It's a nice tool to have in the shop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built dovetail marker. This is made of metal so I think it will last me forever, until I lose it. I like that it has two different scales depending on how big you want your dovetails to be. Excellent quality and very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel B.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It's a great help when you don't have a jig
customer_reviews.author: matthew Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Tool is small bit easy to handle. Shipping was fast and packaging was secure. Product is good.
customer_reviews.author: Torri T

customer_reviews.title: Solid device
customer_reviews.text: The jig came as expected. No surprises which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dovetails are crooked, but thats more user error than anything else
customer_reviews.author: Jonny B

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy,  make something
customer_reviews.text: i liked it being functional and inexpensive without being cheaap
customer_reviews.author: mountainman78629

customer_reviews.title: Simple lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because of the simple fact I can use it to make dovetails as a custom job at whatever distance set apart from each cut I want to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and well worth the purchase price
customer_reviews.text: This device is definitely as I ordered. It is easy to use and well worth the purchase price. Every woodworker should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Green

customer_reviews.title: It's Magic
customer_reviews.text: I'm gonna give it a 5 since it seems accurate and sturdy. I'm still learning to layout dovetails though so haven't really used it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.text: Have only used to test. But so far it looks pretty good. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mario cardenas

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Tools like this should be in everyone's tool chest. The speed and accuracy of my dovetails are outstanding now.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Konkus Jr

customer_reviews.title: The best and most useful dovetail marker available anywhere today
customer_reviews.text: The best and most useful dovetail marker available anywhere today; the convenience of all four dovetail ratios plus a square all wrapped into one. This is a one-of-a-kind, well thought out and engineered woodworking tool. Bravo to the makers of this comprehensive and economical dovetail marker! I would recommend the marker to anyone who carries out dovetail jointing on a regular basis. A must for any tool box for armature or professional.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppy Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made and accurate. No issues as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: rugburner

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son-in-law, Christmas present. I'm sure he will enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Sean Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It does what it designed to do.
customer_reviews.text: A tool that is simple to use, does what it is suppose to, and is reasonably priced. I hope to get many years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Accurate . Easy to read. Easy to use. Markings in white for high visibility! Great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beau C.

customer_reviews.title: Know how to use it
customer_reviews.text: Handy and compact this is a great tool for laying out hand cut dovetails
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works for lining up pins and tails. It wont make the cut for you though.
customer_reviews.author: Jackgreens

customer_reviews.title: pretty handy lil deal
customer_reviews.text: nothing magically makes dovetails easier to cut, but this sure helps. quick delivery and good customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Amram Knox

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use. Haven’t tried using the insides which would probably be tricky. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Dovetail gauge
customer_reviews.text: Increase accuracy by bringing the gauge marks over the edge and closer to the work piece.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and easy to read Definitely worth the money I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: charles jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner in wood working and wood joining I am very pleased with this product. It is a great tool to help anyone learn the process of making a dovetail joint. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Haven't done a project yet but this is sure to ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't done a project yet but this is sure to come in handy when I do. Very well made and should last a life time.
customer_reviews.author: Nate L

customer_reviews.title: It does its job.
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller over all size than what I was anticipating but nothing major.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Jump

customer_reviews.title: Accurately made
customer_reviews.text: Accurately made and quickly shipped. That's all I ask for.
customer_reviews.author: DJC

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Well made but no instructions or other tips. Is handy once you figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: JoeMac

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and reasonably priced tool
customer_reviews.text: I have found this to be an easy and accurate tool to use for simple dovetail marking.
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Having fun
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool. The hollow middle make it easy to make many different dovetails
customer_reviews.author: Shooter McGavin

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for the price. I used it in class today and am very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Nice little piece for when you don't want to set ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice little piece for when you don't want to set up a dove tailer for just a couple pieces. Very happy with it and wish I would have bought 2 in case I lose one.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Rigby

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Lightweight CNC’d aluminum, and easy to use. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Evan C.

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and handy for accurate dovetails - if you don't do them every day
customer_reviews.author: Jörg Kaestner

customer_reviews.title: Small and handy
customer_reviews.text: The marker is easy to use and you have both slopes in one tool. You can slip it in your apron pocket or hang it on a hook near your work station.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Solid purchase. Couldn't find at any big box stores either.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: accurate and dependable
customer_reviews.text: I like this tool because it allows me to make very accurate dovetails of almost any size
customer_reviews.author: Rhett Thornhill

customer_reviews.title: Dovetail Marker
customer_reviews.text: The dovetail marker work great. its just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Handy product with the most common dovetail ratios for marking. Seems well made
customer_reviews.author: Bigtoe

customer_reviews.title: This almost feels like cheating. Makes setting up your dovetails easier
customer_reviews.text: This almost feels like cheating. Makes setting up your dovetails easier, which saves quite a bit of time. Its small enough to fit in your apron pocket, and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, sturdy and metal.
customer_reviews.text: first time to get into woodworking, and this is the first time to use such a product. nice made of metal, and has clear markings. easy to use, and bought it because it has the cut out, which i use for the small projects that i make. so instead of using the outside, i use the inside measurements. so it's like having four markers.
customer_reviews.author: JVSGUSCASD

customer_reviews.title: Compact and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I cut a lot of dovetails and rarely use a marker (cut them freehand), but occasionally have a customer that wants precise spacing and that's where a marker comes in handy. The marker is well made and compact.
customer_reviews.author: BillMcWW

customer_reviews.title: Instructions
customer_reviews.text: The lack of instructions on how use the dovetail marker.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Forehand

customer_reviews.title: Nice gauge
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet... but it is well built, easy to read. At first glance couldn't figure out if printed ratios were for outside or inside tracing. But it became a little more obvious after a few minutes playing.
customer_reviews.author: Al H.

customer_reviews.title: Dovetails made easier?
customer_reviews.text: My wife hasn't given it to me yet in my Christmas stocking, but plan to use to learn cutting hand dovetails. I hope she gets me a nice dovetail saw to go with the gauge.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, but no instructions included on how best to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I found this very easy to use and extremely versatile for all dovetails I create. This is my new “go to” dovetail marker.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace C.

customer_reviews.title: Delivers as expected
customer_reviews.text: It has four ratios, suitable for nearly all situations. I have used it a few times so far, and it is well constructed and sturdy and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle & Christine

product_meta.title: Newkiton Dovetail Marker
product_meta.description: ★ manual cut is not a daunting task any longer with Nekton CNC machined Dovetail marker! ★ 4 kinds of ratios to help woodworkers make accurate Dovetail layout marked for hardwood or softwood. ★ easy to use, makes everything simple, uniform and consistent. ★ add to cart now! Risk free with Nekton money back in 30 days!
feature_bullets: Great handy little tool for woodworker, easy to mark out accurate dovetails, make quick and accurate dovetail layout. Mark out accurately with either slopes for soft and hard well prepared woods.
4 Kinds of Proportion Marked for Hardwood or Softwood：1: 5, 1: 6, 1: 8, 1: 10, Meet Your Different Needs.
Cnc machined for precision. Graduated imperial measurement scale has also been etched onto each of sides.
Made from solid Billet of aluminum, one-piece cutting, lightweight, durable, and easy to go with.
It is a must have tool set for either beginners or experienced woodworkers and perfect gift for woodworking lovers. Risk free with Newkiton money-back in 30 days!
